TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowIdleBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 這個服務行為可控制卸載及保存閒置工作流程執行個體的時間。

span.span: A service behavior that controls when idle workflow instances are unloaded and persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 當設定為值的值大於和工作流程再進入閒置 （因為延遲活動） 如果未變更的工作流程執行個體將會從記憶體中移除呼叫中止，而不是透過一般卸載的處理序...When is set to a value greater than the value of and the workflow then goes idle (because of a Delay activity) if the workflow instance has not changed it will be removed from memory by calling Abort, rather than going through the normal unloading process.. 這是執行階段最佳化不會遺失任何資料，但預期的卸載追蹤時，開發人員查看追蹤記錄檔可能會看到中止追蹤。This is a runtime optimization and no data is lost, but a developer looking at trace log may see an Abort trace when expecting an Unload trace. 如需如何使用這種行為的範例，請參閱[Workflow Service Host Extensibility](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/workflow-service-host-extensibility.md)For an example of how to use this behavior see [Workflow Service Host Extensibility](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/workflow-service-host-extensibility.md)

public TimeSpan TimeToPersist { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan TimeToPersist
Public Property TimeToPersist As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan TimeToPersist { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.TimeToPersist : TimeSpan with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定在工作流程進入閒置狀態與進行保存間所發生的 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the that occurs between the time the workflow becomes idle and is persisted.

value.span: 用於判斷何時保存工作流程的時間範圍。

span.span: The time span used to determine when a workflow is persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會在工作流程執行個體閒置時開始耗用。The begins to elapse when the workflow instance becomes idle. 如果您想要透過盡可能延長將該執行個體保留在記憶體的時間，更積極地保存工作流程執行個體，這個屬性就非常實用。This property is useful if you want to persist a workflow instance more aggressively while still keeping the instance in memory for as long as possible. 這個屬性的預設值為 。The default value for this property is . 屬性的值必須小於 ，此屬性才有效。The property is only valid if its value is less than . 如果此屬性的值較大，則會忽略此屬性。If it is greater, it is ignored. 如果 指定的 在 所指定的 之前耗用，則必須在卸載工作流程之前完成保存。If the specified by elapses before the specified by , persistence must complete before the workflow is unloaded. 也就是說，卸載作業可能會延遲到保存工作流程之後。This implies that the unload operation may be delayed until the workflow is persisted. 保存層負責處理重試暫時性錯誤，而且只會針對無法復原的錯誤擲回例外狀況。The persistence layer is responsible for handling any retries for transient errors and only throws exceptions on non-recoverable errors. 因此，在保存期間擲回的所有例外狀況都會視為嚴重例外狀況，並且會中止工作流程執行個體。Therefore, any exceptions thrown during persistence are treated as fatal and the workflow instance is aborted.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定工作流程進入閒置與卸載間所發生的 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the that occurs between the time workflow becomes idle and is unloaded.

value.span: 用於判斷何時卸載工作流程的時間範圍。

span.span: The time span used to determine when a workflow is unloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 1 分鐘。The default value is 1 minute. 卸載工作流程表示會同時保存該工作流程。Unloading a workflow implies that it is also persisted. 如果將 設定為零，則會在工作流程閒置之後，立刻保留及卸載工作流程執行個體。If is set to zero the workflow instance is persisted and unloaded immediately after the workflow becomes idle. 將 設定為 ，即可有效停用卸載作業。Setting to effectively disables the unload operation. 閒置的工作流程執行個體永遠不會卸載。Idle workflow instances are never unloaded.
